title: Rachel Carson - awareness of dangers of pesticides

content.question: Rachel Carsonâ€™s contributions to the environmental movement include which of the following?

choices.label: Alerting the public to the hazardous waste problem at Love Canal
Increasing public awareness of the risks of using pesticides
Starting the first Earth Day in 1970
Discovering the thinning of the ozone layer in polar regions
Being the first female administrator of the EPA

content.answer: Increasing public awareness of the risks of using pesticides
